text: Jon Hassell (March 22, 1937 â€“ June 26, 2021) was an American trumpet player and composer. He was best known for creatting the idea of "Fourth World" music. It combines world ethnic traditions with modern electronic techniques. Hassell died from natural causes on June 26, 2021 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American composers Category:American trumpeters Category:Musicians from Memphis, Tennessee
title: Jon Hassell
